# shaketoba

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

> A Shiny Application Powered by 'golem'

'Shaketoba', also pronounced as 'Saketoba', is salty dried autumn salmon that is known as a traditional food in the Hokkaido and Tohoku regions of Japan.
